3: Lee's mission log, volume 28.1... I'm carrying out an operation on my own. This footage is for my personal use only. Refer to Gray Raven's mission report for actual details.
Greenwich Mean Time 07:07. These mechanoid guards are all lined up facing the 'golden light beam.' They are... saluting something.
The objective of this solo operation was to search for my missing teammate Liv. Now, however, I'm stuck here...
Although they're not moving, I have detected a 'current web' in the air. Based on my analysis, half a step out there is enough for the mild current to catch my whereabouts...
Whoever designed this 'current web' knows that salutation is when the defense of this area is at its most vulnerable. That's why...
I can only lie here... As long as they don't move, I can't move either.
...59 seconds have passed. Some mechanoids are beginning to move, but the web is still here...
I've deduced that this 'shift pattern' exists because of the differences in their mechanoid models.
Based on their appearances, I've cross-referenced their data with the database on me. The mechanoids who have moved first are all more advanced models.
